\documentclass[border=5pt]{standalone}

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{forest}

\begin{document}

\begin{forest}for tree={rectangle,draw, l sep=20pt}[{<Program>} [{begin} ][{<Code>} [{<Assign>} [{a} ][{<ExprArith>} [{+} [{-2} ][{/} [{*} [{3} ][{<ExprArith>} [{+} [{6} ][{1} ]]]][{5} ]]]]]][{end} ]];
\end{forest}

\end{document}
